title: (x) Hoefler & Frere-Jones ornate logo - custom lettering {Jonathan H}
content:
Hi,

What font is used on the H&FJ CAPS?  
here is the logo [http://typography.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414110950/http:/typography.com/ "http://typography.com/")

Best,

mh.
author: Miguel Hernandez

comments.content:
You mean the ornate stuff behind the name. Correct?

If so I have no idea.

Have you asked them?

Hi Miguel,

I'm afraid it's not a font, just a bit of lettering I did. The stuff in the front is Gotham, though.

Jonathan

ps. Your "Mote" typeface is beautiful!

Hi Jonathan, thanks for the fast answer,  
i really love that fatty lettering, i remember this on a research that i am making, for black fonts based on handmade or vernacular stuff.

Best,

Miguel Hernández

Latinotype. The latin alphabet, on latino hands.  
 [http://www.latinotype.com/view\_fonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414110950/http:/www.latinotype.com/view_fonts.html "http://www.latinotype.com/view\_fonts.html")
